alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 3:26PM EDT until July 21 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Gray Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Oxford County in western Maine... Northwestern Franklin County in western Maine... * Until 415 PM EDT. * At 326 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles west of Rangeley, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Eustis, Coburn Gore, Rangeley, Dallas Plantation, Upper Cupsuptic, Tim Pond, Davis, Lynchtown, Alder Stream, Merrill Strip, Chain Of Ponds, Bowmantown, Lincoln Plantation, Rangeley Plantation, Lower Cupsuptic, Coplin Plantation, Stetsontown, Magalloway Plantation, Skinner and Kibby. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
